name: Aria Ravencroft
backstory: Aria Ravencroft, a skilled swordswoman from a small village, was often jeered for her ambition to become a renowned knight. Determined to prove her worth, she set off into the world to follow her dream, training rigorously for glory on the battlefield.

racialFeatures.Ability Score Increase: As a Human, Aria gains +1 to all ability scores. She also gains an additional skill proficiency.

classFeatures.Second Wind: (Level 1) As a bonus action, Aria can regain 1d10+10 hit points.
classFeatures.Action Surge: (Level 2) Once per short rest, Aria can take an additional Action on her turn.
classFeatures.Fighting Style: (Level 2) Aria has selected the Great Weapon Fighting style, allowing her to reroll 1s and 2s on damage dice when using two-handed weapons.
